Hi everybody


I am wondering what effect the error parameter for each individual
has. I am currently working on heads-up poker players. Each player is
assigned an error which is the squared difference from the fittest
individual.

I am using the jNEAT implementation.


Any help appreciated. Thank you :)



Best regards

Lars
